title.narrative: The value chain for Electric Vehicles charging infrastructure

description.narrative: The ambition of the government of Jordan is to move towards e-mobility, and started working on a e-mobility Roadmap. The Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources collaborates with the Netherlands Embassy on capacity building of public sector employees government on Electric Vehicle charging. This also supports also the EV charging section of the Roadmap, as learning can be drawn for Jordan from the Dutch National Charging Agenda. RVO’s ETF arranged three online sessions, to share this knowledge, and for dialogue to prepare for further cooperation between both countries on EV charging infrastructure. A sector which is well developed in the Netherlands. infrastructure
